Richard_Holbrooke_the.title: Richard Holbrooke, the Last Great Freewheeling Diplomat
Richard_Holbrooke_the.description: George Packer’s biography of Holbrooke, “Our Man,” is a complex portrait of a complex man who had power, but never enough.

A_Psychotherapist_Analyzes.title: A Psychotherapist Analyzes Her Patients’ Stories
A_Psychotherapist_Analyzes.description: Lori Gottlieb’s “Maybe You Should Talk to Someone: A Therapist, Her Therapist, and Our Lives Revealed” is a treasure trove of stories and hard-earned advice.

What_You_Should.title: What You Should Read to Understand the Measles Epidemic
What_You_Should.description: In her Prescribed Reading column, Abigail Zuger looks at books exploring the immune system and the tumultuous history of vaccination.

Globetrotting.title: Globetrotting
Globetrotting.description: Your sneak preview of books coming out in 2019 from around the world.

The_True-Crime_Story.title: The True-Crime Story That Harper Lee Tried and Failed to Write
The_True-Crime_Story.description: In “Furious Hours,” Casey Cep investigates the Alabama murder case that was to have been the focus of Lee’s second book — as well as the famously reclusive writer herself, plumbing the mystery of her 50-year silence.

An_Economist_Who.title: An Economist Who Believes Only Government Can Save Capitalism
An_Economist_Who.description: In “People, Power, and Profits” Joseph E. Stiglitz argues that more state involvement in the economy is part of the solution, not part of the problem.

9_New_Books.title: 9 New Books We Recommend This Week
9_New_Books.description: Suggested reading from critics and editors at The New York Times.

The_Real_Life.title: The Real Life of a Diplomat, Told Like a Novel
The_Real_Life.description: George Packer talks about “Our Man: Richard Holbrooke and the End of the American Century,” and Lori Gottlieb discusses “Maybe You Should Talk to Someone.”

Best_Seller_Lists.title: Best-Seller Lists: May 19, 2019
Best_Seller_Lists.description: All the lists: print, e-books, fiction, nonfiction, children’s books and more.
